item.title: 奇货可居：詹姆斯-范盖伦谈下一代人工智能发展（播客）
item.description: 资金一直在流入人工智能领域，数十亿美元涌入 GPU 集群、数据中心、燃气轮机以及训练和部署越来越大的模型所需的基础设施。那么接下来会发生什么呢？在本期节目中，我们采访了 Citrini Research 公司的创始人詹姆斯-范盖伦（James van Geelen）。我们和他聊了聊他最近去位于德克萨斯州阿比林的 OpenAI 新的大型星际之门数据中心实地考察的情况。我们还讨论了资助这些数据中心的日益复杂的融资安排。【原文：Money has been flowing into the AI space, with billions pouring into GPU clusters, data centers, gas turbines, and the infrastructure needed to train and deploy bigger and bigger models. So what comes next? On this episode, we speak with James van Geelen, founder of Citrini Research. We talk to him about his latest field trip to one of OpenAI’s new massive Stargate data centers in Abilene, Texas. We also discuss the increasingly complicated financing arrangements that are funding some of these m】

item.title: 世界头号大米买家菲律宾计划延长进口禁令
item.description: 菲律宾计划将大米进口禁令广泛延长至四月，以支持世界上最大的大米买家的农民，此举可能会对全球大米价格造成进一步压力。【原文：The Philippines plans to broadly extend its ban on rice imports until April to support farmers in the world’s biggest buyer of the grain, a move that’s likely to put further pressure on global prices.】

item.title: 高市获胜后，日本现金充裕的企业可能面临压力
item.description: 一些策略师认为，支持刺激政策的保守派高市真奈赢得大选后，日本现金充裕的企业可能会感到压力，因为她过去曾对企业持有过多现金表示过担忧。【原文：Cash-rich companies in Japan may feel the heat after the election win of the pro-stimulus conservative Sanae Takaichi, as she has in the past expressed concerns about excess corporate cash holdings, according to some strategists.】

item.title: 朝日啤酒在遭受严重网络攻击后恢复在日本的供应
item.description: 朝日集团控股有限公司（Asahi Group Holdings Ltd.）10 月 2 日重新启动了其在日本的六家啤酒厂，此前该啤酒制造商曾因网络攻击被迫停止生产和运输数日。【原文：Asahi Group Holdings Ltd. restarted six of its breweries in Japan on Oct. 2 after a cyberattack forced the beer maker to halt production and shipments for several days.】

item.title: 瑞士交易所集团将把数字资产部门 SDX 纳入公司内部
item.description: 瑞士和西班牙证券交易所运营商 SIX Group AG 正在退出其数字资产交易所品牌 SDX，并在内部吸收该部门的业务，因为主流金融公司正在加强在传统市场中使用区块链的计划。【原文：Swiss and Spanish stock exchange operator SIX Group AG is retiring its digital asset exchange brand SDX and absorbing the division’s operations in-house, as mainstream financial firms ramp up plans to use blockchain in traditional markets.】

item.title: 乌兹别克斯坦考虑利用伊斯兰金融和新的环境、社会和公司债券实现债务多样化
item.description: 乌兹别克斯坦是中亚第二大经济体，在成功进入可持续债券市场后，正努力使其债务发行多样化。【原文：Uzbekistan, Central Asia’s second biggest economy, is seeking to diversify its debt issuance after successful forays into the sustainable bond market.】

item.title: 橡树支持海湾房地产基金 Arzan 推动私人信贷发展
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）正在为一家中东酒店业投资者提供支持，因为该地区的私人信贷兴趣正日益浓厚。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management is backing a Middle East hospitality investor as private credit interest in the region is gaining traction.】

item.title: 阿斯特拉和第一制药称药物可延长乳腺癌患者的生命
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）和第一三共公司（Daiichi Sankyo）的药物 Datroway 帮助患有特别难治的乳腺癌患者延长了寿命。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc and Daiichi Sankyo’s drug Datroway helped breast cancer patients with a particularly hard to treat form of the disease live longer.】

item.title: 丹麦加强油轮检查以阻止俄罗斯影子舰队
item.description: 丹麦正在加强对通过其水域的油轮的监管，因为欧洲的目标是帮助俄罗斯逃避制裁的影子船队。【原文：Denmark is tightening regulation of oil tankers passing through its waters as Europe targets the shadow fleet that’s helping Russia skirt sanctions.】

item.title: 法国-德国 10 年期收益率差距扩大至 1 月以来最大值
item.description: 在埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统的新连续性内阁引发了对新政府可行性的担忧之后，法国债务相对于更安全的德国同类国家的溢价升至九个月来的最高点。【原文：The premium on French debt over safer German peers rose to a nine-month high after President Emmanuel Macron’s new continuity cabinet sparked concerns for viability of the new government.】

item.title: 欧盟开始向欧洲债券回购市场注入过剩现金
item.description: 欧盟已开始在回购市场上借出多余现金，以换取债券，从而为正面临债务供应增加问题的投资者注入了新的欧元。【原文：The European Union has started lending out its excess cash in the repo market in exchange for bonds, providing a fresh injection of euros to investors grappling with increasing debt supply.】

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁因美国关税再次下调业绩展望，预计销量下降
item.description: 阿斯顿-马丁拉贡达全球控股公司今年第二次下调了业绩展望，理由是美国关税的影响和更广泛的经济挑战阻碍了需求。【原文：Aston Martin Lagonda Global Holdings Plc pared back its outlook for a second time this year, citing the impact of US tariffs and broader economic challenges holding back demand.】

item.title: 条款显示，Verisure 首次公开募股价格可能接近区间上限
item.description: 报警集团 Verisure Plc 的首次公开募股价格可能为 13.25 欧元（15.5 美元），这表明市场对欧洲三年来最大的一次上市需求强劲。【原文：The initial public offering of alarm group Verisure Plc is likely to price at €13.25 ($15.5) in a sign of strong demand for Europe’s largest listing in three years.】

item.title: BC Partners 支持的 Shawbrook 银行宣布伦敦 IPO 计划
item.description: 英国专业贷款机构肖布鲁克集团（Shawbrook Group Plc）计划在伦敦进行首次公开募股，这标志着英国的资本市场出现了可喜的增长。【原文：British specialty lender Shawbrook Group Plc plans a potential initial public offering in London, marking a welcome boost for the UK’s capital markets.】

item.title: 前 MUFG 银行家因盗窃存款箱被判入狱九年
item.description: 东京地方法院周一判处三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.【原文：The Tokyo District Court sentenced a former employee of Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. to nine years in prison on Monday for stealing cash and valuables from customers’ safe deposit boxes.】

item.title: Maynilad 在 2021 年以来菲律宾最大的首次公开募股中以 4.37 亿美元为目标
item.description: 菲律宾公用事业公司 Maynilad Water Services Inc. 已开始接受机构的首次公开募股订单，募集资金可能高达 4.37 亿美元，成为菲律宾四年来最大的上市项目。【原文：Philippine utility firm Maynilad Water Services Inc. has started taking orders from institutions for an initial public offering that could raise as much as $437 million and make it the country’s biggest listing in four years.】

item.title: 芬兰耐斯特公司股价飙升 130% 后面临可再生能源考验
item.description: 芬兰能源公司耐斯特公司（Neste Oyj）的股价是今年欧洲最大的反弹之一，自4月份以来上涨了一倍多。但由于可再生燃料市场将面临压力，一些分析师警告说，这一反弹可能很快就会结束。【原文：Shares in Finnish energy company Neste Oyj have staged one of Europe’s biggest rebounds this year, more than doubling since April. But with the renewable fuels market set to come under pressure, some analysts are warning the rally may soon end.】

item.title: 英镑下滑，富时指数在创纪录收盘后保持稳定
人工智能健康初创企业 Heidi 获 Point72 基金 4.65 亿美元投资
item.description: Heidi是一家利用人工智能为医生自动处理行政工作的初创公司，在新一轮融资中筹集了6500万美元，由亿万富翁史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）的Point72私人投资公司领投。【原文：Heidi, a startup that uses artificial intelligence to automate administrative work for doctors, has raised $65 million in a new funding round led by billionaire Steve Cohen’s Point72 Private Investments.】

item.title: 印度考虑解决沃达丰欠费风波以加强与英国的关系
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，印度政府正在寻求加强与英国的关系，因此印度正在考虑一次性解决其长期以来对沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）陷入困境的本地合资企业数十亿美元拖欠费用的要求。【原文：India is considering a one-time settlement of its longstanding demand for billions of dollars in past-due fees from Vodafone Group Plc’s beleaguered local venture, as the government seeks to strengthen ties with the UK, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: EssilorLuxottica 增持尼康股份后，尼康股价大涨近 6
item.description: 尼康公司披露 EssilorLuxottica SA 增持其股票后，其股价创下两周多来的最大涨幅，这表明这家雷朋眼镜制造商正加大对芯片制造设备的重要供应商的投资。【原文：Nikon Corp.’s stock rose its most in more than two weeks after disclosing that EssilorLuxottica SA has increased its holding, suggesting the Ray-Bans maker is placing a bigger bet on a pivotal supplier of chipmaking equipment.】

item.description:
股市令人激动，但日元疲软可能会使佐奈高市偏离目标。【原文：

item.title: 欧洲央行二把手之争影响拉加德继任人选的寻找
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）正在进行为期两年的调整，将更换三分之二的高层领导，其中包括行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）。【原文：The European Central Bank is heading into a two-year shake-up that will replace two-thirds of its top leadership — including President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 机器人扫雷领域的领导者可能会扩大莱茵金属的支持范围
item.description: 世界上最大的非乘员扫雷车生产商 Dok-Ing d.o.o. 正在与莱茵金属公司（Rheinmetall AG）就扩大其技术和确保获得这家德国国防巨头的投资进行谈判。【原文：The world’s largest producer of uncrewed mine-clearing vehicles, Dok-Ing d.o.o., is in talks with Rheinmetall AG over expanding its technology and secure investment from the German defense giant.】

item.title: 欧洲转向暂停，美联储将推动全球降息
item.description: 美联储和全球同行似乎将在今年余下的时间里继续降息，延续欧洲大部分国家的做法。【原文：The Federal Reserve and global peers appear set to keep cutting interest rates in the remainder of this year, carrying on where much of Europe has left off.】

item.title: BBVA 首席执行官称萨瓦德尔机构投资者支持竞购
item.description: 西班牙对外银行（BBVA SA）的高层预计，持有萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）股票的绝大多数机构投资者都会接受该银行对其较小竞争对手的收购要约。【原文：BBVA SA’s top executive expects the vast majority of institutional investors who hold shares in Banco Sabadell SA to accept his bank’s offer for its smaller rival.】

item.title: 高盛认为日本债券 "震荡 "蔓延至国债
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Volatility in Japan’s longer-dated government bonds is on the rise following Sanae Takaichi’s election win, and the moves may spill over to markets as far away as the US and UK, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 泰国通货膨胀率连续六个月为负值
item.description: 泰国通胀率连续第六个月低于零，这可能会推动央行在本周降息。【原文：Thailand saw inflation dipped below zero for the sixth straight month, likely giving the central bank an impetus to cut interest rates this week.】

item.title: 日本首相高市将担任重要职务，处理执政党团结问题
item.description: 新当选的日本执政党领袖佐佐江-高市似乎准备安排一些重要职位，以应对未来的重大挑战，从巩固党内团结到遏制对其财政立场的担忧。【原文：Sanae Takaichi, the newly elected leader of Japan’s ruling party, appears set to arrange key posts to address major challenges ahead, from shoring up party unity to curbing concerns over her fiscal stance.】
